document.full_text: an arizona pastor shot and killed himself at his church after being served with a search warrant investigating his internet conversations with a 14-year-old girl, police said on friday.
document.title: pastor kills self as police question him over girl
lines_and_colors: an arizona pastor shot and killed himself at his church after being served with a search warrant investigating his internet conversations with a 14-year-old girl, police said on friday.
